credit card checkout

A part of a design challenge where I was to design 1 new UI element per day for 100 days.

Filename: device.png

Filesize: 1 MB

Click on the image to see it in full size

Day two of the challenge was to design a credit card checkout screen for any device/screen.

I chose to work with an already existing brand since that would streamline the basic process with color palette etc since that already existed. I also chose to work with an iPad as a base since the current app does not support iPads and I wanted to see what I could do with the little larger screen.

I'm qute happy with the result since it looks modern, is very clear and there is no unneccesary content.
